text: Bhagwanpura, Madhya Pradesh is a village & Tehsil in Khargone district in the Indian state of Madhya Pradesh. ==Geography== Bhagwanpura is located in the Narmada Valley, at . Situated in southern area of Khargone district, Bhagwanpura lies from Khargone. It is a Tehsil of Khargone district. ==References== ==External links== * Khargone District Category:Khargone district Category:Villages in Khargone district
title: Bhagwanpura, Madhya Pradesh
